system.description:
Doubles a creature's speed and grants 3 bonus stamina at the start of each turn for the duration. When the spell ends, the target is lethargic for one turn.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect 2 creatures. At dice count 6, grants even more stamina. At dice count 9, no lethargy afterward. At dice count 12, affects multiple creatures. At dice count 15, grants supernatural speed and massive stamina bonuses.
